iaik.security.dsa

Class SHA2withDSAParams

  • java.lang.Object
    • iaik.security.dsa.DSAParams
      • iaik.security.dsa.SHA2withDSAParams
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.security.interfaces.DSAParams

    public class SHA2withDSAParams
extends DSAParams
    DSAParams implemenation that provides access to the validation parameters counter and domain parameter seed (if set).
    See Also:
    SHA2withDSAParameterSpec

    • Method Detail

      • getCounter

        public int getCounter()
        Gets the counter value. May be required for parameter validation.
        Returns:
        the counter value from the parameter generation procedure, or -1 if the counter has not been set

      • getSeed

        public byte[] getSeed()
        Gets the domain parameter seed. May be required for parameter validation.
        Returns:
        the domain parameter seed from the parameter generation procedure, or null if the domain parameter seed has not been set
